mapper.select: SELECT dealrecord.user_id, dealrecord.amount, dealrecord.order_time, dish.dish_name, dish.price, dish.dish_id FROM dealrecord INNER JOIN dish ON dish.dish_id = dealrecord.dish_id WHERE dealrecord.user_id = #{user_id};
